name: Ant Overlord
description:
This is Ant Overlord for my KrassJam, 

This is my first Entry to a Game Jam and I am learning C# at this time so i'm beginner.

This Games theme idea was - A Sim Game where you farm ants to score happiness points. 

This Game only requires a  mouse, Click the object to collect happiness, spend happiness to gain more Automatic Ant workers.
